content:
Hi, I'm adding a new module to rustc_data_structures called stable_iterator. I introduced a new file compiler/rustc_data_structures/src/stable_iterator.rs and placed my code there. However, it isn't compiled, if I try to use it I get an unresolved import error.

Are there some other non-obvious steps I have to follow?
Is there a mod stable_iterator entry in the lib.rs file?
Hameer Abbasi has marked this topic as resolved.
